question: 1. From following, the alternative name for 3D printing is ________ .

answers.a: 3D CAD data - CAD solid model - STL file - RP prototype
answers.b: CAD solid model - 3D CAD data - RP prototype - STL file
answers.c: STL file - 3D CAD data - CAD solid model - RP prototype
answers.d: 3D CAD data - STL file - CAD solid model - RP prototype
